data.text: Ma e wach mane okor kuom Damaski:
Mier madongo mag Aroer nodongʼ gunda
Dala maduongʼ mochiel nolal nono koa Efraim
Nochal mana ka jakeyo mabeto cham
Kaka cham dongʼ e puodho bangʼ hulo,
Ok gini ngʼi kende mag misango,
E kindeno miechgi madongo mochiel motegno, mane giweyo nikech jo-Israel, biro chalo gi kuonde mojwangʼ motimo bunge kod buya kendo giduto ginidongʼ gunda.
Wiyi osewil gi Nyasachi ma jaresni;
kata obedo ni chiengʼ mipidhogieno ema gidongoe
Yaye, winjuru mahu mar ogendini mangʼeny,
Kata obedo ni gimor mana ka pi mogingore,
Kochopo odhiambo, kibaji nogogi apoya nono!
